message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000, which is a 16.7% discount from its true value. If you buy this product, you'll be getting an amazing deal. If you don't buy it, I'll have to move on to the next product, which might not be as good. What do you say?
I'll take it.

I'm not comfortable with the uncertainty. I'll pass on this one.
